fully_contract(remove_inputs=False) → AbstractNode[source]

contracts the entire network into a single node (currently using auto contractor)

static convert_from_qiskit_matrix(mat: array) → array[source]

transforms matrix from qiskit shape to TensorNetwork shape using permutation matrix

static convert_to_qiskit_matrix(mat: array) → array[source]

transforms matrix from Tensornetwork shape to qiskit shape using permutation matrix

dump() → dict[source]

dumps datastructure to dict

Returns:

data = {“num_qb”: int, “data”: list[dict[“name”: str, “inds”: list[int], “mat”: np.array]]}

static get_p_mat(n: int) → array[source]

returns a permutation matrix for conversion from/to qiskit

Parameters:

n – number of qubits (size will be 2^n)

static pack(mat: ndarray) → array[source]
